content.body: double checking my reading of something: revoked proxies, if [[Call]]'d, always throw TypeErrors created from the caller's realm regardless of which realm the proxy was created in, because only function objects remember their creation realm in [[Realm]], and since the revocation error is thrown from within Proxy exotic objects' of [[Call]], no Realm switching has been done yet. is that right?
